actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption from incremental pricing pursuant to the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978.

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed rule under the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 relating to incremental pricing of natural gas, a copy of which was transmitted to Congress on October 11, 1979.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption from incremental pricing pursuant to the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978.
